name.baseName: Natural gas exploitation;Bongkot mine; Field mining
天然气开采 ; Bongkot矿场 ; 矿场开采

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Natural gas extraction: Natural gas used as feedstock for the Bang Pakong power plant is mainly extracted from the Bongkot mine in the Gulf of Thailand and controlled by PTT Exploration and Production Co. Ltd. (PTT Plc.). This study focuses on the main natural gas production at the Bongkot site
天然气开采：作为Bang Pakong电厂原料的天然天然气主要从泰国湾Bongkot矿场开采，由PTT勘探和生产有限公司（PTT Plc）控制。这项研究的重点是Bongkot场地的主要天然气生产

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Bongkot mining area in the Gulf of Thailand

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The purpose of this LCA study is to determine the environmental emissions from each process of natural gas power generation from cradle to gate, and to compare the environmental impact of emissions released from the power generation process of two different power plant technologies (i.e. combined cycle and thermoelectric). The main scope of this study is to provide material balance and environmental information for all life cycle stages (natural gas extraction, crude oil extraction, natural gas separation plant, power plant and transportation). All processes of natural gas power plants are standardized to 1 MWh of power provided by the power plant.
本LCA研究的目的是确定自发电从摇篮到大门以来天然气发电的每个过程的环境排放，并比较两种不同发电厂技术（即联合循环和热电）的发电过程中释放的排放物对环境的影响。本研究的主要范围是提供所有生命周期阶段（天然气开采、原油开采、天然气分离厂、发电厂和运输）的物质平衡和环境信息。天然气发电厂的所有过程都标准化为发电厂提供的 1 MWh 电力。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described pertains to the extraction of natural gas specifically for the feedstock of the Bang Pakong power plant. The gas is primarily sourced from the Bongkot field in the Gulf of Thailand, managed by PTT Exploration and Production Co. Ltd. The Bongkot site's primary natural gas production is a critical component in the generation of electricity, utilizing technologies such as combined cycle and thermoelectric power generation.
本工业流程描述的是作为Bang Pakong电厂原料的天然气提取过程。天然气主要来源于泰国湾的Bongkot矿区，由PTT勘探和生产有限公司管理。Bongkot场地的主要天然气生产是电力生成的关键组成部分，采用联合循环和热电发电技术。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data obtained by LCA mainly comes from major sources, such as factory information; In the absence of raw data, use secondary data, such as existing literature data, calculations and measurements.
LCA获得的数据主要来自主要来源，例如工厂信息;在没有原始数据的情况下，使用二手数据，例如现有文献数据、计算和测量。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: This study only focuses on the environmental flow part of the main products of each process
本研究仅关注每个过程的主要产品的环境流部分

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Phumpradab, K., Gheewala, S. H. & Sagisaka, M. Life cycle assessment of natural gas power plants in Thailand. Int J Life Cycle Assess 14, 354–363 (2009).
Phumpradab, K., Gheewala, S. H. & Sagisaka, M. Life cycle assessment of natural gas power plants in Thailand. Int J Life Cycle Assess 14, 354–363 (2009).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This LCA study aims to evaluate the environmental emissions for each stage of the life cycle starting from natural gas extraction to the delivery of electricity, offering material balance and environmental data for the complete cycle including extraction, separation, power generation, and transportation. Users should ensure that data used reflects the actual process and technologies employed at the Bongkot site. Secondary data sources should be used with caution, ensuring they are relevant and up-to-date. The standardized environmental flow data is mapped against the production of 1 MWh of electricity to allow for comparative analysis and should be applied in that context.
本LCA研究旨在评估从天然气提取到交付电力的每个生命周期阶段的环境排放，提供包括提取、分离、发电和运输在内的完整周期的物质平衡和环境数据。用户应确保所使用的数据反映了Bongkot现场实际使用的过程和技术。在缺乏原始数据时，应谨慎使用二手数据源，确保它们的相关性和最新性。标准化的环境流数据是针对1 MWh电力的生产进行映射的，以便进行比较分析，并应在该背景下应用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. This process comes from natural gas power plants and upstream process emissions of natural gas and fuel oil
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。该过程来自天然气电厂及天然气和燃料油上游工艺排放
The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. This process comes from the total methane emissions during the mining stage of the mine
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。该过程来自矿场开采阶段甲烷总排放
The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. This process comes from the total carbon monoxide emissions during the mining stage of the mine
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。该过程来自矿场开采阶段一氧化碳总排放
There is no input of much coal in the literature, assuming (1:1)
文献中没有input多少天然气，假设(1:1)
